Articles.Content:
I personally watch about 30 youtubers, but I won't name all of them.

My top 5 are

:

Nerd3 as he is funny, adorable and actually makes gaming commentary funny.

Ashens, he is a 39 year old bloke who reviews pound shop tat, and can Do ten minute review of an Easter egg, and is funny in a cynical way.

Crabstickz (aka Chris Kendall), he is part of that group of vloggers who all all exist on whatever alternate dimension tumbr users exist in. He does good sketches, and is fairly amusing

Duncan of the yogscast IMHO, minecraft gaming coverage does not interest me, but I adore tekkit. He is funnier than the yogscast, and is actually good at gaming.

Boogie 2998 he seems like a very nice fellow, and Francis is hilarious.
Markiplier, Scott Manley, and my own channel: Rage0978.
